content: आगम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To come, come near, approach. {@--2@} To arrive at, attain, reach; fall into (a particular state or condition); आनृण्यमागम् to become free from debt; so विश्वासं, ध्यानं &c. {@--3@} To have recourse to. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (--गमयति) {@--1@} To cause to come or draw near. {@--2@} To lead towards, take, convey; आगमितापि विदूरं <ls>Gīt. 12.</ls> {@--3@} To announce the arrival of; राजानमागमयति = राजागमनमाचष्टे <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--4@} To ascertain, inform oneself about; प्रज्ञामेवागमयति यः प्राज्ञेभ्यः स पंडितः <ls>Vop.</ls> {@--5@} To learn, acquire, study; सम्यगागमिता विद्या प्रबोधविनयाविव <ls>R. 10. 71</ls>; तदप्यागमितं मया <ls>Mb.</ls>; आगमय दंडनीतिं कुलविद्यां <ls>Dk. 155</ls>; <ls>Mv. 5</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 79.</ls> {@--6@} (<ab>Atm.</ab>) To wait for, have patience; आगमयस्व तावत् = क्षमस्व <ls>Sk.</ls>; आगमयते कालं <ls>Vop.</ls>
